name: MultiMapUtilsTest
description: Unit tests for the MultiMapUtils class, which provides utility methods for handling MultiValuedMap instances.

test_cases.name: testEmptyIfNull
test_cases.description: Tests the emptyIfNull method to ensure it returns an empty map if the input is null, and the original map otherwise.

test_cases.name: testEmptyUnmodifiableMultiValuedMap
test_cases.description: Tests the EMPTY_MULTI_VALUED_MAP constant to ensure it is empty and unmodifiable.

test_cases.name: testGetCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the getCollection method to ensure it retrieves the correct collection of values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testGetValuesAsBag
test_cases.description: Tests the getValuesAsBag method to ensure it retrieves the correct bag of values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testGetValuesAsList
test_cases.description: Tests the getValuesAsList method to ensure it retrieves the correct list of values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testGetValuesAsSet
test_cases.description: Tests the getValuesAsSet method to ensure it retrieves the correct set of values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testIsEmptyWithEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the isEmpty method to ensure it returns true for an empty map.

test_cases.name: testIsEmptyWithNonEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the isEmpty method to ensure it returns false for a non-empty map.

test_cases.name: testIsEmptyWithNull
test_cases.description: Tests the isEmpty method to ensure it returns true for a null map.

test_cases.name: testTypeSafeEmptyMultiValuedMap
test_cases.description: Tests the emptyMultiValuedMap method to ensure it returns an empty and unmodifiable map.
